alert.note: Alert for Kipahulu; Maui Windward West; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 09 at 3:10AM HST until August 09 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND MAUI... .Surf along east facing shores will remain very rough and around the advisory level today, then steadily lower tonight through the second half of the week as the trades begin to ease. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf of 7 to 10 feet. * WHERE...East facing shores of Maui and Molokai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kipahulu; Maui Windward West; Molokai Southeast; Molokai Windward; Windward Haleakala
